testcase.name: User creates a new quote in Sales/Quotes
testcase.system-out: Given the user logged in to the application with 'stanemirdanstefan@gmail.com' and 'B3x!oAG1'.passed And the user is on the Quotes page..........................................passed When the user creates a new quote with 'new quote' and '10' and '12'........passed Then the quote is successfully created with the correct values for 'new quote' and '10' and '12'.passed

testcase.name: User changes status of a quote from draft to pending
testcase.system-out: Given the user logged in to the application with "stanemirdanstefan@gmail.com" and "B3x!oAG1".passed And the user is on the Quotes page..........................................passed And there is a quote in "Draft".............................................passed When the user marks the quote as "Pending"..................................passed Then the quote status should change to "Pending"............................passed
